picoxlsx4j.style

Class Font

  • java.lang.Object
    • picoxlsx4j.style.Font
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Font>

    public class Font
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Font>
    Class representing a Font entry. The Font entry is used to define text formatting
